<!DOCTYPE html>
  <body>

  <script src="//plus.google.com/hangouts/_/api/v1/hangout.js"></script>
  <script src="//jakemcc.github.io/hangout-timer/prod-main.js"></script>

  <script>
    function init() {
  // When API is ready...                                                         
  gapi.hangout.onApiReady.add(
      function(eventObj) {
        if (eventObj.isApiReady) {
        hangout_timer.core.main()
        }
      });
   }

  gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(init);
  </script>
  </body>
  </html>
